EntityDefinition.description: Required. Available in API version 34.0. The entity definition for the object associated with this workflow field update.

EntityDefinitionId.description: The ID of the entity containing the workflow field update.

FieldDefinition.description: Required. The definition of this field.

FieldDefinitionId.description: The ID of the field for the workflow field update.

FullName.description: The full name of the associated metadata object in Metadata API.

LiteralValue.description: If the update uses a literal value, this is that value.

LookupValueId.description: If the update looks up a value, this lookup value is referenced.

ManageableState.description: Indicates the manageable state of the specified component that is contained in a package: beta deleted deprecated deprecatedEditable installed installedEditable released unmanaged

Name.description: The name of the workflow field update.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace of the package containing the workflow field update object.

SourceTableEnumOrId.description: The enum (for example, Account) or ID of the object this workflow field update is on.
